document_data.name: Joyous Star Song
document_data.mainbody: '''Joyous Star Song''' were scrolls of sheet music providing [[bard]]s with divine inspiration.
document_data.Description: The scrolls were made of beaten [[silver]], and stamped with the symbols of [[Milil]] and [[Lliira]]. They were inscribed with musical notations and lyrics for inspiring songs.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, a bard singing the song inscribed on the scroll would receive divine inspiration, performing longer and better than usual.
document_data.History: The first ''Joyous Star Song'' scrolls were created by the [[Church of Milil]] and the [[Church of Lliira]].
